## SampledTimer class

A timer that stores the last `n` samples in a ring buffer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SampledTimer extends SimpleTimer 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(statistics, name)](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a <code>SampledTimer</code> instance. Must still be added to statistics if it should be logged! |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxNumSamples](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.maxnumsamples.md) |  | number | Maximum samples until the statistics are reset and updated, which may destroy a median computation. |
|  [name](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.name.md) |  | string |  |
|  [numResets](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.numresets.md) |  | number | The number of times the timer has reset. |
|  [samples](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.samples.md) |  | [RingBuffer](./harp-mapview.ringbuffer.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | The array of sampled values, its length cannot exceed <code>maxNumSamples</code>. |
|  [statistics](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.statistics.md) |  | [Statistics](./harp-mapview.statistics.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getStats()](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.getstats.md) |  | Updates the <code>min</code>, <code>max</code>, <code>avg</code>, and <code>median</code> values. Currently, this function is expensive, as it requires a copy of the sampled values. |
|  [reset()](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.reset.md) |  | Resets the timer and clears all of its historical values. |
|  [setValue(val)](./harp-mapview.sampledtimer.setvalue.md) |  | Add a single measurement to the sample. |
